home.content:
# NEOS: Interactivity
---

Hello, Wrold!

Welcome to Lecture 2 of **NEOS**. Today we will be talking about how to add interactivity to our webpages.

Be sure to hit me up on **[slack](https://neoschat.slack.com/messages/general/)** if you've any questions!

#### Main Goals
---

1. Review CSS selectors
2. Learn basics of programming
3. Add functional interactivity with jQuery

#### Game Plan
---

#### [Warmup](#warmup)
#### [CSS Review](#css-review)
#### [Responsive](#responsive)
#### [Programming Basics](#programming)
#### [jQuery Plugins](#jquery-plugins)
#### [Common UIs](#common-uis)

warmup.content: # Warmup --- Let's begin with a simple exercise. #### Exercise --- Go **[here](https://github.com/mottaquikarim/Spiderman)**. See the big green button on the right? Click on it and **download zip**. To that code, in **index.awesome.html**, add the following: Your version doesn't have to look exactly like this, but be sure to include: 1. Three columns in a row 2. Buttons on the bottom 3. Icons on top **Stretch Goals**: make them stack if the page width is too small... #### Inspiration --- Here's some landing page inspiration. * [Operator](https://operator.com/) * [okmylo](http://okmylo.com/) * [moments](http://momentsapp.com/) * [trippeo](https://www.trippeo.com/) * **[kong](https://kong.wtf/)** * [stripe](https://stripe.com/) * [neubible](http://neubible.co/) * **[flyosity](http://flyosity.com/filters/)** * [todoist](https://todoist.com/iphone) * **[gameit](http://gameit.us/)** * [qapital](https://www.qapital.com/) * [urban walks](http://urban-walks.com/#nicer_way) * **[quizup](https://www.quizup.com/en)**
